name: @monstermakes/larry-bnd
description: Build and Deploy of mono repo projects.

scripts.start: echo '=> This is a library project and therefore has no server component. Exiting...' && exit 0
scripts.test: echo '=> Verifying...' && npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test-unit-check-coverage
scripts.clean: echo '=> Cleaning built assets...' && rm -rf .nyc_output coverage
scripts.lint-fix: echo '=> Fixing Linting errors...' && eslint src/**/*.js --fix
scripts.test-unit: echo '=> Running Tests...' && npm run test-unit-file 'test/unit/**/*.spec.js'
scripts.watch-test-unit-file: echo '=> Running Test Watcher for individual test...' && npm run test-unit-file -- --watch
scripts.watch-test-unit: echo '=> Running Test Watcher...' && npm run watch-test-unit-file 'test/unit/**/*.spec.js'
scripts.test-unit-report-coverage: echo '=> Running Tests w/ Coverage...' && nyc --all --include 'src' --exclude '.history' npm run test-unit && nyc --reporter=html report
scripts.test-unit-check-coverage: echo '=> Running Tests w/ Coverage...' && npm run test-unit-report-coverage && nyc check-coverage --lines 100 --functions 100 --branches 100 --satements 100 --per-file
scripts.view-code-coverage: echo '=> Launching code coverage results in browser...' && open coverage/index.html
